name: Shootski
description:
Shoot your way through mutated aliens across 20 levels.

FEATURES
 - Steal enemy abilities with your charge shot.
 - Shooting several enemies in a row amps your bullets into double damage.
 - Full gamepad support.
 - Plenty of level elements to make each level feel fresh.
 - Crane riding.
 - Explosive barrels on conveyor belts.
 - Grades per level.
 - Levels crafted in 30 minutes or less.
 - 5 difficulties, including Kid Mode (can switch difficulties while playing)
 - In-game achievements.
 - 35 songs.
 - Plenty of secrets to discover!
 - Keeps track of your fastest times.
 - Stage select (once a stage is beaten).
 - Collapsing blocks.
 - Checkpoints, or avoid them entirely.
 - Alternate routes.
 - Pulling magnets to cross chasms.
 - 6 enemy types. 99% are random.
 - "Realistic" lighting.
 - On-line Leaderboards
 - 2 hours worth of action.
 - Imagine your own story - because there isn't one.

ANIMATIONS

GAME HISTORY

Based on an obscure game. Once a year, I think about making a game based on that game. This was the year to finally complete my dream - all in 10 days, and then a month of tweaking and fixing issues.
